application.desc: GROBID - A machine learning software for extracting information from scholarly documents

figure.head: Facilities❏❏
figure.figDesc: Data producer = data owner ❏ Data only available on demand ❏ No embargo except if a scientific publication is scheduled Only one facility : Royal Institute for Cultural Heritage (BE) uses a licence Creative Commons 3.0 by-nc-nd for one dataset ❏ 2 facilities are thinking about licensing their datasets: -AGLAE-C2RMF (FR) for "Digital reports and grey literature" and "Digital imaging" -CATS (DK) for "CATS Reference Collection Database and Digital Documentation"

div.p: instrumentation for non-invasive measurements CNR-INO (IT) CNR -ISTM (IT) CNRS (FR) IESL-FORTH (GR) LABDIA (IT) NCU (PL) RWTH (DE) UNIPG (S.M.A.Art) (IT)

Data types ❏ Digital data except : -"Reports and grey literature collection" (C2RMF) -"Imaging collection" (C2RMF) ❏ Various formats : Data hosting Internal servers External hard disks LTO tapes Computers... 1st solution 2nd solution Other solutions
Open formats for texts and sounds
